Title: Color picker control for Silverlight
Description: Color picker is a custom Silverlight control that makes it easy to add color picking functionality to the Silverlight projects.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Color picker is a custom Silverlight control that makes it easy to add color picking functionality to the Silverlight projects.

Read this blog post for more information and a demo: http://youpvp.com/blog/post/Color-picker-control-for-Silverlight.aspx

Install NuGet package: http://www.nuget.org/List/Packages/ColorPickr
